sen.j: 松平 宗允（まつだいら むねただ）は、丹後国宮津藩の第4代藩主。
sen.e: Munetada MATSUDAIRA was the forth lord of the Miyazu domain, Tango Province.
Munetada MATSUDAIRA was the fourth lord of the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province.
sen.cmt: fourthのスペルミス修正、domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: Munetada MATSUDAIRA was the fourth lord of the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province.
He was the seventh generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.
He was the seventh generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.
He was the seventh generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.

sen.j: 安永9年（1780年）6月30日（異説として天明2年（1782年）5月3日）、第3代藩主・松平資承の次男として江戸で生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the second son of Suketsugu MATSUDAIRA, the third lord of domain in Edo on July 31, 1780 (heresy June 13, 1782).
On July 31, 1780 (heresy June 13, 1782), he was born in Edo as the second son of Suketsugu MATSUDAIRA, the third lord of the Domain.
sen.cmt: in Edo、日付表記の位置を移動、third lord of domain→third lord of the Domainと
sen.e: On July 31, 1780 (or June 13, 1782, according to other sources), he was born in Edo as the second son of Suketsugu MATSUDAIRA, the third lord of the Domain.
sen.cmt: (heresy June 13, 1782)→ (or June 13, 1782, according to other sources)

sen.j: 長兄の松平資統が病弱だったため廃嫡となったことで世子に指名される。
sen.e: He was appointed to the heir since his eldest brother Tsukemune MATSUDAIRA was disinherited due to poor health and succeeded to the family head due to his father's retirement on December 27, 1795.
He was appointed to the heir since his eldest brother Tsukemune MATSUDAIRA was disinherited due to poor health.
He was appointed to the heir since his eldest brother Tsukemune MATSUDAIRA was disinherited due to poor health.

sen.j: 寛政7年（1795年）11月17日の父の隠居により家督を継いで第4代藩主となる。
sen.e: On December 27, 1795, he succeeded to the family head and became the fourth lord of the Domain due to his father's retirement.
sen.cmt: 「一原文一訳文の例外対処」「第4代藩主となる」→訳漏れのため訳出しました。
sen.e: On December 27, 1795, when his father retired, he succeeded his father as the head of the family and became the fourth lord of the Domain.

sen.j: 文化5年（1808年）8月6日、家督を弟で養子の松平宗発に譲って隠居する。
sen.e: On September 25, 1808, he was retired by ceding the family head position to his younger brother and adopted child Muneakira MATSUDAIRA.
On September 25, 1808, he was retired by ceding the family head position to his younger brother and adopted child Muneakira MATSUDAIRA.
On September 25, 1808, he was retired by ceding the family head position to his younger brother and adopted child Muneakira MATSUDAIRA.

sen.j: 文化13年（1816年）6月14日に江戸で死去。
sen.e: He died on July 8, 1816.
On July 8, 1816, he died in Edo.
sen.cmt: 「江戸で」→訳漏れのため訳出、日付表記移動
sen.e: On July 8, 1816, he died in Edo.
He was 37 years old.
He was 37 years old.
He was 37 years old.
